Original text: Your %s glows with the light of a thousand stars...
Your shooting might is affected by your equipment.
Translation: На вашу силу стрельбы воздействуют надетые на вас вещи.

Original text: Your shooting speed is affected by your equipment.
Translation: На вашу скорость стрельбы воздействуют надетые на вас вещи.

Original text: Your %s lets out a long, shrill note...
Your speed is affected by your equipment.
Translation: На вашу скорость воздействуют надетые на вас вещи.

Original text: Your stealth is affected by your equipment.
Translation: На вашу скрытность воздействуют надетые на вас вещи.

Original text: Your strength is affected by your equipment.
Translation: На вашу силу воздействуют надетые на вас вещи.
Ваша сила не может быть снижена.

Original text: Your weapon has been blessed by the gods.
Your weapon is a great bane of demons.
Your weapon is a great bane of dragons.
Your weapon is a great bane of undead.
Translation: Ваше оружие - великое лихо живых мертвецов.

Original text: Your weapon is especially deadly against dragons.
Translation: Ваше оружие особенно смертельно против драконов.

Original text: Your weapon is especially deadly against giants.
Translation: Ваше оружие особенно смертельно против гигантов.

Original text: Your weapon is especially deadly against orcs.
Translation: Ваше оружие особенно смертельно против орков.

Original text: Your weapon is especially deadly against trolls.
Translation: Ваше оружие особенно смертельно против троллей.

Original text: Your weapon strikes at animals with extra force.
Translation: Ваше оружие бьет животных с особой силой.

Original text: Your weapon strikes at demons with holy wrath.
Translation: Ваше оружие атакует демонов с праведным гневом.

Original text: Your weapon strikes at evil with extra force.
Translation: Ваше оружие бьет зло с особой силой.

Original text: Your weapon strikes at undead with holy wrath.
Translation: Ваше оружие атакует живых мертвецов с праведным гневом.

Original text: Your wisdom is affected by your equipment.
Translation: На вашу мудрость воздействуют надетые на вас вещи.
Ваша мудрость не может быть снижена.

Original text: You see a pile of %d objects.
You see nothing there to bash.
You see nothing there to close.
You see nothing there to disarm.
You see nothing there to open.
You see nothing there to spike.
You see nothing there to tunnel.
You sense the presence of buried treasure!
You sense the presence of doors!
You sense the presence of evil creatures!
You sense the presence of invisible creatures!
You sense the presence of magic objects!
You sense the presence of monsters!
You sense the presence of objects!
You sense the presence of stairs!
You sense the presence of traps!
You sense the presence of treasure!
You tunnel into the granite wall.
You tunnel into the magma vein.
You tunnel into the quartz vein.
You will have to do better than that!
